item.title: The OSCR website is live!
item.description: The official website of the Open Science Community Rotterdam is now live! Have you heard of this community but you donâ€™t really know what we do? On the Home page you can find our mission and scope. Who are the members of our community? Click on People to find the member list and a brief description of their expertise. This section will rapidly be updated with new profiles, so make sure to check it out often!
